content.detailedDescription:
Was taking my dog out to relieve herself at 6 am in my back yard. my yard is on a flight path to the airport (bwi) so we see planes all the time. i looked upward to the east  and at about halfway up the sky and saw a white blinking light moving quickly across the sky heading to the northeast. when i first saw it, it maybe was slightly smaller than an aspirin held at arm's length. it was blinking slightly more than once a second. i really didn't think much of it and assumed it was a high flying moving quickly across the sky. 
after watching it for about ten seconds, it appeared to jump from one spot in the sky to another about an inch away. i watched as it continued flying mostly in a straight line till it flew by my line of vision past the tree line by my home. 
through the trees it appeared to jump twice more (each jump was smaller than the first one). i lost sight of it through the trees after about a few more seconds. the total time i saw it was about a minute or so (no more than two minutes).
i had already had my shower and was fully awake when this occurred. i am not 100% sure that my eyes weren't playing tricks on me, the trees were swaying slightly due to the wind, but i figured i should report it just in case someone else saw it. note the first jump occurred before the light hit the tree line.
content.summary: Saw a blinking light jump in position several times in pasadena md

content.detailedDescription: In addition to a very fast ufo at about the 32-34 second mark (noticed by someone else), there is a flash of red light coming from the back of the helicopter (seemingly aimed at the person filming) at the 29 second mark. it's a quick flash and you'll need to watch the video frame by frame to see it. it appears to be a laser-like flash or the chopper's occupants were returning the favor by taking a photo of the person filming them. better that scenario than them taking "aim" at him through a lighted scope!
content.summary: Ashland kentucky video of helicopter

content.detailedDescription:
While i was driving home last night, a round, yellow "ball of light" flew over my car, from back to front, in the sky. 

the object continued on a straight path until it seemed to just disappear. i got home (around the corner and down about 1/4 a block) and stood on the porch a few minutes to see if it returned. it did not.

this happened very quickly, and it left me awestruck:  it wasn't a star (it was about dusk and the stars weren't out yet), and it was much lower in the sky than a star. and it definitely wasn't an airplane.  

it was a round ball of light, traveling in a straight path.
content.summary: Yellow, round light flew over my car

content.detailedDescription: I was on the back of a motorbike on our way to catch the ferry from dover to boulogne,about 5miles from the port of dover,it was immediately before the war with the falkland isles in 1982.A fullish moon and a clear night i saw a large metallic object with a dull sheen to my right(south),i knew it was something odd as it made no sound was very large and had no lights except the reflected moonlight.It remained stationary and silent in the sky to my right for about 90seconds,i didn't alert the driver as i didn't want to take my eyes off it and thought it would be gone by the time he had stopped to look.I was right,it suddenly moved without accelaration or sound at lightening speed in a straight line acrooss the sky heading north.I have no explanation of what it was but i felt i knew it was a ufo as soon as i saw it,i was aware that our military were likely to be around because of the impending falklands conflict so i had to discount their aircraft which was easy to do once it moved.
content.summary: Brushed metallic surface,large no apertures no lights silent

content.detailedDescription:
1.  i couldn't go to sleep, so i stepped outside the side porch for some air.

2.  i was just gazing at the stars when i noticed the lit object.

3.  when i first noticed it i thought it was a plane in the distant, but when my eyes adjusted to it, i noticed it was huge with multiple lights.

4.  it was a v-shaped ufo with multiple lights under it.  it was traveling pretty quickly from a south to north direction.  i was getting excited because it was going to pass pretty close to the moon and i was going to get a better view of its outline.  as it got closer the lights quickly dimmed and it vanished.

5.  at first i was startled to see something so close, then i got excited about it.

6.  it seemed to vanish and there was no more sign of it.
content.summary: A v-shaped ufo

content.detailedDescription: Driving back from pittsburgh to morgantown, wv on april 1st, 2012 at roughly 1-1:20 am, a bright, pulsating light was observed in the clouds west of i-79 roughly around mile marker 36. it had been raining that evening, so when i first saw the lights, i assumed it was lightening and thought nothing else of it. my friend, who i was riding with mentioned it, and i looked again. this time i noticed that the light was consistently pulsating a brilliant reddish-orange, like you would see with a forest fire at night. just the amount of light would indicate that had it been a fire, it would have been of massive proportion and would have been reported on the news by today, not to mention it had been raining most of the day. we watched the light as we continued travelling southbound, for at least 6-7 miles, discussing what it could have been. the light stayed stationary as we drove past, still glowing brightly behind us. i've never seen anything like this before on a drive back from pittsburgh at night, and if there's some kind of logical explanation, i'd like to know, but i can't find a single thing.
content.summary: Brilliant, pulsating light observed from vehicle in southwestern pennsylvania.

content.detailedDescription:
In the evening of 01/04/2012 i was with my girlfriend and we had been discussing paranormal events in her area so we went to the one location she was most unnerved by so as i can identify the feeling she had gotten many times before. the whole evening i had been observing the stars but as we were at the location that held paranormal interest i noticed a very bright red star-like object in the sky, i stopped and said "ah would you look at mars!" a moment passed until i realised that it could not be mars at all for mars was behind me to the left of the moon! it then hit me that the red light this object was emitting was incredibly vivid and growing in intensity. i then reached into my pocket for my phone to take an image of the light. 

as i did my girlfriend noticed the object began moving, i raised my phone and though i doubted that it would even pick up the light from this object it most certainly did. my girlfriend and i then stood and followed with our eyes as this red glowing object had really started to move right past beneath the "big dipper" and close to mars, remember earlier i had said mars was behind me opposite from where this object was. then it stopped dead in its track and began dimming and getting smaller which in my opinion mean that it was moving away from the earth now.

i wish i could say i've been surprised by this but truth is i've seen a lot of craft before including spheres, triangles, and a saucer though the saucer i had unwittingly caught on camera by accident. i've had a history of ufo's being around me as far back as conception. i've also seen hundreds of planes, comets/meteors, satellites, planetary bodies, and of course chinese festival lanterns so i'm quite aware that what i saw with my girlfriend tonight was none of those objects. i have also noticed that when ever i'm with my girlfriend i tend to see things more frequently.
the photos i've attached show a swirl of red light, that's a result of my motion as its difficult to focus in on a star like object with a smart phone. 3 attachments two are the same photo just one has been blown up and has details of the image and camera on it and the other two are the raw photos. 

i'd also appreciate any form of contact with someone in mufon as i have a photo of what clearly looks like a cloaked saucer in mid flight with an energy field around it. i've maxed out my multimedia attachments here.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Star/ sattelite-like distinctly red glowing object (not mars) in clear skies above croydon  with distinctive flight path

content.detailedDescription: It was around 11:25 pm on 3/31/12 was talking to my brother on the cell phone walking back home was in a empty parking lot where there is dollar general store.I walking past a street light in the parking lot,in the top field of my vision above the street light i noticed a white light i looked up thinking maybe a shooting star.But what i saw was the most unusual shaped  outlined i ever seen.Best way to describe it was the outline of huey type helicopter but just the "tail illuminated" with about 8 different very white lights evenly spaced out and with the a single light where the bottom of the body would be.The was no noise and nor do i live where the is a airport where they fly helicopters ,they just fly small cessna types crafts.Like i said the whites were very white and not the type the use on any aircraft i ever seen.Saw the object for just a  few secs and then  just disappeared
content.summary: Unusual shaped object with white llights

content.detailedDescription: I wont go into detail on my experience. instead i want to ask mufon if they have ever heard of wormhole displacement?
content.flightPath: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Brother inlaw and i werd camping when witnessed what we both thought was a satalite. but satalites and planes dont stop start to decent and stop again. then hover and then flash to your maglite flashlight and interchanging beam headlamp.

content.detailedDescription:
Live on a pretty secluded farm in n.W indiana. nearest neighbor about 1/4 to 3/8ths of a mile away.  was home alone, in kitchen cooking a late dinner about 7:45 pm, so it was dark.  no moon.. just a clear sky and lots of stars out.  then my two dogs (labs) were outside, and started barking like mad.  looked out the kitchen window, and saw some unusual lights just over one of my fields. being curious as to who or what the heck would be over or in my field at that time or the night, i went outside and walked toward tree line on edge of field. i watched these two round orbs come closer and closer, and get larger and larger, while glowing brightly yellow, yellow orange, yellow red.  they stopped right at my tree line, between my house and my field, one hovering about tree top high, the other about 15 feet off the ground.. about 300 feet (a hundred yards)in front of me.  my dogs went nuts.. hackles up... growling and barking like they lost their minds.. and it scared the hell out of me. dogs ran back to house and went into their dog houses. i walked backwards to house all the while watching these things.  they made absolutely no sound. i have seen silver disk shaped ufo's several times during the day over the period of my 50 plus years, but never anything like this.  

then after about 3 minutes of hovering at my tree line, the lower one went up to about 60 feet.. and shot off to the left (north)over my trees moving from zero to what appeared to be about 50 mph instantly.  three or four seconds later, the other one which was still hovering at about 60 feet (top of my trees) sped off in the same direction after the first one about twice as fast as the first one.

lost sight of them once they got back over my large woods. 

they were not any type of conventional air craft that i am familiar with, and they were definitely not props, jets, choppers, balloons, gremlins, faries, the good year blimp, or anything or anyone with a glow stick or a spot light swinging through my tree tops either. they were not stars, the 
moon, venus, mars, a lunar eclipse, or light reflecting from anything.

when they were about 300 feet from me, they were about the size of my pickup... so they had some good size to them. the glow they emitted did not come from a light source, they just glowed.. and the colors vascillated yellow, yellow orange, red orange. they did not blink or flash or strobe like any conventional lighting i have ever seen.  oddly, the glow they emitted did not seem to light anything up around them.. at least as far as i could see.  they just glowed.. and they were bright as hell.
i thought that was really wierd.. especially from the one that was about 15 feet above my field... from my angle which was pretty much straight on..
i didn't see the field light up under this thing, and if it were a conventional light of some kind, it certainly should have lit up the field, but it didn't.  

my dogs are farm dogs, and they are not afraid of anything our here, wild animals, people, aircraft, etc.  but they definitely senced something about these things that literally scared the hell out of them.  they acted "sheepish" and marginally frightened for several days thereafter. 

don't have a clue what they were, but i know for certain that i don't ever want to see them that close again.

thats it.  they came in slowly, they changed altitude, they hovered, made no sound, we watched.. then they quickly left!
content.summary: Two glowing round orbs, at closest, were about the size of my pickup truck.

content.detailedDescription: Please email me for pics. [email removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: I have pictures

content.detailedDescription: As i was driving south on 7100 from fairfax city towards burke, va, i saw a flying vehicle moving faster than i thought it should be moving at its altitude.  it was near dark, but there was just a bit of dusk left.  the vehicle was pretty high in the air, but not sure how high.  we have at least 2 airports in the area so i've seen hundreds on approach.  when i pointed it out to my wife i pointed out that it had a single light instead of the faa required suite of lights.  she watched it and told me that the light went out.  as we got to the bridge over braddock rd. she looked to the right (west) and yelled that it was hovering now.  i looked over and it had reached a very low altitude.  it had to be 300-400 feet off the deck.  it was cylindrical disk shaped.  as we drove past, about a 1/4 mile i looked in my side mirror to see if i could see it and i saw that it was moving slowly across 7100 to a popular soccer field, which was packed with players.  the whole ship was flashing multiple lights in random order.  it was a fantastic display, but i was out of eye-shot before i could see where it went.  when we turned around to see if we could find the ship and it's path, we could no longer see it.  the forests are starting to fill in and the trees are quite tall, so seeing distances in the sky is next to impossible.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Speeding ufo, hovered and lit up like christmas

content.detailedDescription: I observed a disc shaped object over the california side of the colorado river while on a walk this date. i left the rv at roughly 12:05 pm walking north to a marina and restaurant at shortly after noon. when rounding the marina at 12:22 pm, i noticed a silvery object over the ca side of the colorado river moving slowly in a sw direction. it was at about 5-6,000 feet (as measured from the heights of the hills below them) and at a horizontal distance of about 1/2 mile. it did not have any wings. it did not have any emissions or make any noise that i could hear. i watched it for about 45 seconds. it was sliding to the sw; slowly ascending, and then accellerating at a rate that i could not begin to describe. it did have a top or upper layer. i returned home at 12:32 pm. i appear to be missing 8-10 minutes.
content.summary: Observed ufo over ca side of colorado river this date

content.detailedDescription: Ashland kentucky vidio: ufo seen in vidio 32 seconds in flying right to left
content.summary: Ashland kentucky vidio

content.detailedDescription: First off i am former army recon with the 1rst cavalry and i know beyond a shadow of a doubt these were definitely not of this world. it was about 12:30 when i went out into my yard for some fresh air on this exceptionally clear night, not a cloud. i made it about 15 paces into my yard before a light(bright and flickering so many colors so very fast) caught my very sharp and well trained eyes.I am familiar with everything that flies, rolls, or is fired. this object tracked very slowly about due west about 200'-300' about the ridge witch i estimate at roughly 1 kilometer from my position. i studied this thing in complete awe, full knowing where this this did not come from at least, for about 15 mins before i pulled out my bright led flashlight. i blinked the morse code signal for s.O.S 2 times directly at it and it stopped briefly before dimming as it descended(as if it let up on the throttle and killed some power to descend) the it got bright with red on the bottom and shot up about 200' in about 2 secs as it do so it dimmed back to its normal luminosity(as if burning power off as it rose). it eventually track too far west to be seen from my angle. so of course i start looking hard for any more activity and actually to my surprise, i indeed seen another, this one much closer slightly obscured be trees. i got to a better vantage point and flashed sos and included the numbers 1-9 interpreted through flashing my light. indeed it seemed to respond by flashing so bright it must have been pointing directly at me and my brother(indeed at times it seems to use a separate yet from the same source, light witch did not produce a beam but was like looking at a spot lot shined right at your face). i continued with my light trying different things to grab its attention as it gradually dimmed completely out then back again 3 times before continuing due west staggered behind and right to the other object by about 1kl. by 1kl(back and right) until it tracked so far west i could not make it out, it just pin-pointed out of my vision. on a final note, i called some of my friends and 2 of them witnessed the same event witch exactly corresponded with my angle and time!!! i believe this is going to be the year of a forced disclosure, hows them apples congress!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: 2 orbs of light displayed breath-taking manuevers every so often and was tracking about due west in staggered formation.

content.detailedDescription: I witnessed a star like shape pulsating vibrations of the rainbow. it would move around the sky unlike anything i had ever witnessed. it cast down a beam of light which i went under and entered into some sort of vortex. attached below is the video from joshua tree, california on march 30, 2012.
content.summary: Ufo sighting at joshua tree

content.detailedDescription: Saw it outside my window, watched it for full duration, did not get any photos, had binoculars but it was just very bright and went from bright red to white. it climbed up then turned right and slowly flew inland , went more to white then faded and fell to earth inland from my location. no noise heard, but the surf was very loud.
content.summary: Bright pulsing light, moved from over ocean to far inland, faded then fell

content.detailedDescription:
In nov. of 1989 i was driving sober south bound on hwy 101 in goleta ca just past patterson overpass at about 9:45pm when i saw a very bright white orb over santa barbara about 10 miles away. it was moving very fast towards my direction along and over the freeway. i knew this was an orb ufo, as i have seen them before. it was too bright and went much too fast to be any known aircraft. it then stopped over turnpike overpass and turned into a huge black triangle with red lights at each corner (as i later saw as i got under it) and then moved towards the ocean. from the side it looked like a long, black line as it had no thickness to speak of. i got off at turnpike and got right under it, stuck my head out the window and got a good look at it as it slowly moved towards the ocean. it was very black. it looked like a void of blackness, unlike any black surface. the red lights at each corner did not reflect any light off the bottom of that blackness, as they should. i thought it was some sort of a space gate that may have been scanning the area. i don't know, but i could not call that blackness an object, it was void of mass. likewise, the ambient light from the city light should have reflected at least something, but it did not. i do tv lighting so i know this stuff. i followed it with my car, as it moved at a constant speed of about 4 mph and spun very, very slowly from it's axis as it faced the ground. i stopped my car again, turned it off this time, and looked out the window at it. i felt safer to stay in my car. it made no sound. it was at least 2,000 feet long and 500 feet off the ground, above me. it filled much of the sky as i looked straight up at it. at least 2 other people in cars stopped and watched it too. one was a cop in a police car. we all had eye contact with each other and made gestures of disbelief to each other as we looked up at it and back to each other. as a joke, i made a gesture with my hand that the cop should shoot at it, but he was not amused and looked disturbed. we were all disturbed. although i have have seen orbs before, those are cute, but this big black thing looked wicked evil. it passed over san marcos high school and covered 90% of the school, it was huge. those cars later moved on, but i later followed it as it descended into a large open space known as mora mesa, into the darkness beyond my sight, so i left. 5 minutes later i told a friend about it, and then we saw a white orbs from his house that went straight up and out. i soon later saw another orb that went over the mountains but my friend missed that one. it was about 10:15pm and that was that. fyi: i think i reported this sighting with nuforc but i don't see it there. but this time i made a picture, it looks exactly like what i saw.












ss
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: White orb turned in huge black triangle (blacker than black) with red lights on each corner.

content.detailedDescription:
As my self and two others in my back yard were just hanging out before everyone left. i saw an orange glowing sphere coming over the house. i dont know how high it was but it was defenently to low for a reg aircraft.
the three of us stood and watched it pass over the house for about one min.
there was no sound what so ever, my girlfriends unkle tryed telling me it was a "falling star" and i instintly called him an idiot. i have been watching the stars a good portion of my life and i have never seen anything like that . we watched it head north west at around 11:30 pm as it flickered off in the distance.
content.summary: A glowing orange sphere flew in a perfectly straight line at a slow speed at low altitude wth absolutly no sound, 4 witness's

content.detailedDescription: On thursday i was getting ready for bed when i say a fire type light from my back patio window. i went outside to see what it was. i was looking at a redish orange glow being distorted by clouds. i was trying to rationalize the event and said well maybe we have a red moon tonight for some reason. i was tired and just watched it for a while. i thought several times to go and get my camera, but knew that the battery would be low from earlier use with my kids. i kept convincing myself that it was a strange moon. the next day i was talking with an uncle and he said that we only had a quarter moon last night. i could have kicked myself. i realized that this was definatly not the moon. i really got suspicious the following day when i heard helicopters over my home. i went outside because they kept flying over. the helicopter was drab green with no markings. i was further surprised to see paratroopers doing loww jumps out of the back of the helicopter (long duel rotor). i ran inside and retrieved my camera snd staerted filming. i saw parachutes opening behind the trees. i had to pick up my kid from school so i stopped filming. i drove around the area that i thought the landed in and did not see them. i at this time stopped and left the area. i have never seen military trainnig in this area. i thought to myself is the series of the past two days coincidence or something else.
content.summary: Firey ball of light( i thought it was a harvest moon distorted by clouds

content.detailedDescription: Got up to let cat in seen one glowing light in sky then noticed two more following behind it so woke up girlfriend to witness it then three more came behind them was a total of 5 objects and they didnt look like planes or copters no noise could be heard or blinking lights seen then they disappeared behind cloud cover were we the only ones to see this?Wasnt able to get video or pictures but believe it was not any ordinary objects.
content.summary: About 12 45am 5 yellow orange objects travelled across sky from south to north

content.detailedDescription: It was about 2:29 am on april 1st. i went out on my back pporch for a smoke and was trying to identify some stars and constellations from memory. out over the salt lake wildlife management area i saw a bright light appear, bright like a shooting star, but flying at what appeared to be a constant altitude. it flew from over the forest to the west, over south lake, and directly overhead. at about 40 degrees above the east horizon it suddenly disapppeared. the duration of the flight was around 30 seconds, and i estimate the distance traveled to be about 8 miles. i spend a great deal of time hunting fshing and ccamping in that w.M.A. and know this landscape day or night, so my estimation of the distance is approximate. my house sits at the top of a hill overlooking south lke and the salt lake wma, so the path of the flight was completely unobstructed from view. when fist observed it appeared to be about the size of a bb. as it traveled towards me it grew in size to what appeared the size of a basketball, and then reduced again in size as it proceeded east and then disappeared. although it was extremely brilliant like a shooting star, it was traveling much too slow, was at what seemed to be a constant altitude, and when passing overhead appeared to be just a brilliant white solid ball. i have no idea of the actual altitude or size of the object, but from where i was able to see it when it appeared from my location, as an educated guess i would say around a thousand feet. the terms "bb + basketball" refer how they appeared to me visually from my location.
content.summary: Apppeared over forestt to west, extremey bright, crossed above lake and directly overhead

content.detailedDescription:
I was on the pa turn pike and pulled off on the first rest and refreshment stop and got out of my car and i wondered what all of the noise i was hearing was about!
after looking up at the direction the noise was coming from i saw what i thought was a train because it seemed to be one of those trains that have over 100 cars and very long but covered by fog but i could see large parts of it clearly. 
the time at this point is about 905pm 
just then a small person seem to just appeared and he told me he was the fbi i needed to come with him and i believe i refused and he said he would force me to if necessary and the next thing i know i am on the ship.
one thing i can recall clearly is when they copied all of my memory's i was feeling violated and if you will raped mentally.
the next thing i know i am back in my car in the driver seat and awake and the time now is 1030pm. 
i started the car and felt the need to get the hell out of here!
however i did not know why at the time, i felt very very confused and nervous when i drove away from the area.
content.summary: Very large craft and contact with life from within

content.detailedDescription: I was at my mothers house at around 11:30 to midnight i was sitting on the back porch talking to my wife on the cellphone when off in the distance i saw a string of lights that were very bright i was trying to figure out what i was looking at when it moved like nothing ive ever seen i told my wife oh f#$% there is a f%^& ufo in my mommas back yard i threw the phone down and ran inside and told my nephews and mother to come look so they wouldnt think i was crazy when my nephews came outside it was still almost directly above our back yard then it just shut off like a light switch and we saw something shoot through the sky like a shooting star but it was big and then we noticed there were a bunch of planes out. there have been other people see unexplainable things from my moms back yard as well.
content.summary: We saw a string of lights over a house then they disapeared and reappeared imediately over us

content.detailedDescription: Me and my boyfriend we are outside in the house looking the star because the earth hour, in the time like 8:55 pm, in the north we saw a blinking star, to strong color blue pale like other star, and bright like venus, they blink 3 times, but each blink time was 12 or 15 seconds, low for airplane, or slow and to bright for satellite, and only one color blink no more colors. in the same place, a place with no other star a black space, we have android google sky and no famous star there.And disapear in the 3rd blink. what is that?
content.summary: Flashing starlike object in the sky

content.detailedDescription: It was approximately 9:30pm eastern time in central florida. i was 10 years old, and my family was returning home, winter park, fl, after visiting family in tampa. my father was driving and my one brother and two sisters were in the car as well. i was sitting in the back seat looking at the stars. the sky was completely clear and i could see the stars very well. we were outside of any major city, so there were no nearby city lights to disrupt vision. one of the times i looked up i noticed a very bright light that was jumping up and down, and side to side, staying within a specific range of movement. the light was a circle and definitely much brighter than the stars or even venus or jupiter. it was brighter and larger than a typical passenger plane coming in for a landing. it seemed to have a center point which its pattern of movement was centered around. it would move up from that center point then return. it kept 'jumping' up, down, and to each side, left and right of the center point. but it would always return to the center point after each movement before making another move. also, the bursts of movements were always the exact same distance from the center point, and always a straight line, no matter which direction it moved. after watching it for about 10 minutes, i told my father to look at it. my father is a very intelligent gentleman who served 7 years in the army as a computer technision. he was quite amazed as i was, and we pulled over on the side of the freeway and all of us sat in the car watching this light for about 30 minutes. it never changed its location in the sky and it never went away. it just kept making quick bursts of straight line movements from its center point. also, it always moved in one of four directions... straight up, straight down, straight to the left, or straight to the right. and it would usually pause for a few seconds at its center point before making another movement in one of the four directions. the movements were also very fast, almost as if it were jumping to each point. it was probably within a 5 mile distance from us and i would say probably about 10,000 feet up. it wasn't real high above us. it was more like out to our side, low in the sky. also, the movements were short distances from the center point. maybe 500 to 1000 feet. it never went away and we finally drove home. my father smiled and said, "it's things like that, that make you wonder what else is out there." it was something i will never forget, and i thought i would share it with mufon. thanks for taking the time to read this. good luck with your research. i truely believe that there is definitely intelligent life throughout our incredibly large universe. mr. trevor tompkins
content.summary: Bright light that constantly shifted direction within one area of the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
As a nurse, i always left work at approximently 7:30 pm to 7:40 pm.  i would leave work on a narrow county road, through the hills.  rarely met another vehicle.  this evening, it was dark, as usual and i just rounded a curve when i seen what i first thought was a shooting star.  but this object was on fire and it was huge and descending slower than a star.  i had always seen shooting star fall at an angle and so very fast, you barely got to observe it before it disappeared.  this object was falling slower than a shooting star and the fire was bellowing from it.  it looked like the flames were comeing from a cylinder shape, but i didn't actually see the cylinder.  it was falling straight down, not at an angle.  it fell behind a hill, so i lost sight of it.  i heard no noise.  i continued to drive, still wondering if this was a meteorite or what?  i was telling my brother about it yesterday and he says we should go to the area and try to find the objest.
i cannot climb the hills anymore, due to a bad knee.  i can take someone to the area and point out where it was falling.  this could have been a meteorite, but unlike anything i've ever seen.  i didn't have a camera and there were no other vehicles around.
content.summary: Large flaming object falling straight down and not as fast as a shooting star

content.detailedDescription:
On 1/12/2012 at 2:05 a.M., i was in bed sleeping and i was awakened by a loud noise that lasted about 45 seconds.  i then got up and looked out the window and saw the above-described object for about 1 minute across the street.  then the object lifted up and went over the house in back and down where i lost sight of it.

about 6:00 a.M. that morning 2 helicopters arrived about where i first heard the noise and hovered at about the same location where i heard the noise.  then they turned and came east to where i saw the object and they then turned north and followed the same path as the object.

my first reaction was that i was a little scared then that feeling went away and i just looked at the object in amazement.  after the object left, i just stood at the foot of my bed wondering what to do next.  i then decided to go back to bed and deal with what i saw later in the morning. 

note:  see attachments.  one is an image done by a friend.  it is a photo of the house where i saw the object with a representation of the object superimposed on it.  the second is a recent newspaper article about my sighting.  and the third is a newspaper article about a fatal traffic accident that occurred the morning of 1/12/2012 at approximately the same time the object left my view and traveled in the direction where the accident occurred.

can you please send a copy of this report and attachments to chuck weaver.
i spoke with him a few days ago and he asked that i file this report and that he would get a copy.

thank you,
content.summary: Heard loud noise then saw round-egg/domelike shaped object on ground for one minute then object lifted off.

content.detailedDescription:
Went to step out my back door to enjoy a moment of a gorgeous evening when i looked up to see if there were any ufos. too my complete shock there were a group of lights that ran perpendicular over the top of our 40 by 60 foot shop. it took a second to absorb the idea that it was even there.  my response was..Omg omg it's a ufo a mother ship.  there is no way that is was anything else...I believe it was over 300', and with a good mathematician they could let me just how big it was....I tried getting a video and pictures  but i was just so excited.  also tried calling my neighbor , no answer...Ran to the house...But the huge ship was moving over the horizon.  the whole thing lasted 7  to 10 minuted.  my neighbor did see the lights i was pointing out to him  but the angle of the string of lights  was now down to one  which at first he thought was a star  then the light went out..
the lights on the craft, i could not see anything else , would with a pattern  turn off and on...Reminded me of a movie  where the space ship is on cruse control with crusing lights on.  ran silent and was huge!!! move  toward ironton, mo and belgrade, mo.  to the nw of roselle. mo.
content.summary: Huge invisable craft.  w/ 7 to 9 lights that ran in a perpendicular, flashing off and on.  slilent...Moving slowly.

content.detailedDescription:
I was smoking on the balcony of my flat. it was impossible not to notice several bright moving objects on the sky in front of me. my first suppose was it's artificial lights like "chinese lanterns". however it's doubtful bacause there is a mile-wide river (danube) and miles of unsettled swampy land where objects flew from. 

six or more bright orange circular moving spots. objects moved smoothly from about ne to sw. they slightly changed group configuration and speed. no any noise was present. 
i didn't feel strange anyhow. fortunately, i had my camera and tripod at hand and managed to make some photos. unfortunately, camera automation set too long exposure. however the last visible object can be seen without motion blur.  

the objects left my viewfield due to its limitation by building walls. 
the last observed object stopped moving horizontally and rather began to draw away growing down.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Six or more bright orange circular moving spots. objects moved smoothly from about ne to sw.
